actions.name: Prismatic Guard

cost.trigger: When the user is hit by a non-[Contact] Physical- or Special -Category attack

actions.description:
Trigger: When the user is hit by a non-[Contact] Physical- or Special -Category attack
Effect: The attacking creature takes 2 Ticks of HP damage and is Dazzled 5.
